attributes.action: Give the Post Office Tower back to the people of London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Mr Brown, Grafik magazine feels strongly that BT should give the Post Office Tower and its revolving restaurant back to the people of London. The interior should be returned to its former glory, and a lottery system should be set up to determine who eats there. Food should be at 1966 prices, subsidised by Jamie, Nigella, Delia and Gordon. And just one more thing, can we go back to calling it the Post Office Tower please?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
